numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In all sports leagues except Baseball, at least 60% of players are people of color.
2. In Baseball, less than 60% of players are people of color.
3. In all sports leagues, at most 41% of head coaches are people of color.
4. There are few head coaches of color.
6. I wonder why there are few head coaches of color despite diverse players.
7. The graph specified women in the National Basketball Association.
8. The graph did not specify women in the other leagues.
9. I question why the graph specified women only in the National Basketball Association.
10. The major sports leagues fail to have a diverse set of head coaches.
12. The data indicates that people of color have a disadvantage in becoming a head coach compared to non-colored people.
13. The headline is: Racial Diversity in Sports: What are the percentages of players and coaches of color in major sports leagues?
